statements: SELECT episode_id, viewer_id, rating, review FROM episode_ratings WHERE viewer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM episode_ratings WHERE episode_id = 3
SELECT episode_id, rating FROM episode_ratings WHERE viewer_id = 2
SELECT viewer_id, rating FROM episode_ratings WHERE episode_id = 4
SELECT * FROM episode_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM episode_ratings WHERE rating > 3.5 ORDER BY episode_id DESC, viewer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT episode_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM episode_ratings GROUP BY episode_id HAVING COUNT(viewer_id) > 5 ORDER BY max_rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM episode_ratings WHERE episode_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY viewer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM episode_ratings WHERE review IS NOT NULL AND CHAR_LENGTH(review) > 50 ORDER BY episode_id, viewer_id;
SELECT episode_id, COUNT(viewer_id) AS total_viewers, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM episode_ratings GROUP BY episode_id HAVING total_rating > 50 ORDER BY total_viewers DESC, total_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_ratings;
SELECT episode_id, rating, timestamp FROM viewer_ratings WHERE viewer_id = '987654';
SELECT * FROM viewer_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT viewer_id FROM viewer_ratings;
SELECT episode_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM viewer_ratings GROUP BY episode_id;
SELECT * FROM viewer_ratings WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT viewer_id, COUNT(episode_id) as total_episodes FROM viewer_ratings GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING COUNT(episode_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_episodes DESC;
SELECT episode_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM viewer_ratings GROUP BY episode_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, review_text FROM viewer_reviews WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(review_text) > 50 ORDER BY viewer_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_id, COUNT(review_id) as total_reviews FROM viewer_reviews GROUP BY episode_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Episode;
SELECT episode_title, air_date FROM Episode ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, email FROM Viewer WHERE viewer_name='John Doe';
SELECT episode_title, rating FROM Episode JOIN Rating ON Episode.episode_id = Rating.episode_id;
SELECT viewer_name, episode_title, rating FROM Viewer INNER JOIN Rating ON Viewer.viewer_id = Rating.viewer_id INNER JOIN Episode ON Rating.episode_id = Episode.episode_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM Episode JOIN Viewer ON Episode.episode_id = Viewer.viewer_id WHERE air_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT episode_title, viewer_name, rating FROM Episode JOIN Viewer ON Episode.episode_id = Viewer.viewer_id JOIN Rating ON Episode.episode_id = Rating.episode_id WHERE rating >= 4.5
SELECT viewer_name, rating FROM Viewer JOIN Rating ON Viewer.viewer_id = Rating.viewer_id ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT episode_title, air_date FROM Episode WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY air_date DESC
SELECT episode_title, count(viewer_id) as total_viewers FROM Episode JOIN Rating ON Episode.episode_id = Rating.episode_id GROUP BY episode_title HAVING total_viewers > 100
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_title, viewer_rating FROM episodes WHERE viewer_rating > 4.0;
SELECT episode_title, viewer_rating, viewer_review FROM episodes WHERE viewer_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY viewer_rating DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_title, viewer_rating FROM episodes WHERE viewer_rating > 4.5;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT episode_title, viewer_rating FROM episodes WHERE viewer_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4;
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE episode_id = 'some-uuid';
SELECT * FROM Episodes;
SELECT episode_name, season_number, episode_number FROM Episodes WHERE season_number = 1;
SELECT show_name, genre, year_started FROM Shows WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT username, age, location FROM Viewers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT episode_name, air_date, duration FROM Episodes WHERE air_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT episode_name, season_number, episode_number FROM Episodes WHERE season_number = 1;
SELECT viewer_id, username, age, location FROM Viewers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT episode_name, air_date, duration FROM Episodes WHERE episode_number IN (1, 3, 5) AND season_number = 2;
SELECT viewer_id, episode_id, watched FROM ViewersToEpisodes WHERE viewer_id = 1001 AND watched = true;

SELECT viewer_id, username, episode_name, rating FROM Ratings JOIN Viewers ON Ratings.viewer_id = Viewers.viewer_id JOIN Episodes ON Ratings.episode_id = Episodes.episode_id WHERE rating > 8 ORDER BY rating DESC, username ASC;
